text: Samyung ENC is a South Korean manufacturer of marine communication and navigation systems. The company is publicly listed and traded on the KOSDAQ. ==Market share== Samyung ENC is a leading company in a highly fragmented marine electronics industry that includes Raymarine, Humminbird, Lowrance, Simrad, B&G;, Magellan, Murphy, Naviop, Northstar, Samyung ENC, Sitex, TwoNav, Furuno, Geonav. ==Products== The product line includes high frequency radio, GPS floater, and very high frequency (VHF) transmitter-receiver. ==References== Category:Manufacturing companies established in 1978 Category:Engineering companies of South Korea Category:Manufacturing companies based in Busan Category:Navigation system companies Category:Marine electronics Category:South Korean brands Category:South Korean companies established in 1978 Category:Companies listed on the Korea Exchange
title: Samyung ENC
